text: Olaf Pooley (13 March 1914 - 14 July 2015) was an English actor and screenwriter. He was known for his roles in Highly Dangerous, Hell Is Sold Out, The Lost People, The Huggetts Aboard, and in Lifeforce. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1914 births Category:2015 deaths Category:English centenarians Category:English movie actors Category:English screenwriters Category:English television actors Category:People from Poole Category:Writers from Dorset
title: Olaf Pooley
